channel.title: Domain on Coding Odyssey
channel.description: Recent content in Domain on Coding Odyssey

item.title: Setup a blog with Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: Intro It was long my desire to write a blog with stuff that interests me. Lately i was studying Golang and i came across Hugo which is a really nice and fast site generation utility. This was a great opportunity to start my own blog by using Hugo and Github Pages in order to host it. Why? it’s free it’s Github it’s easy and fast This is a walk through on how you can have a blog easy, fast and free!
